RWrapperMiscellaneousPkg 1.7.0
  • Reference

    read excel sheet by name to json

    read_sheet_by_name.Rd

    This is a function to read out the content out of a excel sheet to json array

    read_sheet_by_name(file_path, sheet_name)

    Examples

    read_sheet_by_name("example_input.xlsx","Test1")
